section.para: The following problems are known to exist for GridFTP at the time of the 4.0.1 release:

listitem.simpara: Bug 2547: gridftp config detach option doesn't work

listitem.para:
GridFTP Server
There are some small memory leaks, though they should not grow much. Threaded builds should work, but increased pollers may produce hangs (please report these). Some error responses are unclear. Bug 2547: gridftp config detach option doesn't work See the known issues section of source-trees/gridftp/server/src/TODO in the source installer for other issues.
